title: Network won't load open the client
body:
I'm playing on mac OS X 10.9.3 

My client crashes with every game and doesn't even load the client anymore. I used another network and everything ran like normal. Is there anyway to fix this?

Ps. I have restarted my computer and modem on multiple occasions.

replies.body:
Have you tried turning it off and back on?

jk

What error comes up when the client fails to launch?
The only message that pops up is telling me that the client is running the background and that i should terminate it. When i do, it's still not working.

How long have you waited for it like that? Usually when it does that, it's the pre-patcher patching the patcher. Might take a long time, occasionally.

And if you are 100% it's frozen, try it with full permissions.
It honestly doesn't open anything, if it opened the patcher it would be easier to fix but it doesn't even give me that LOL

If that's the case, and you have waited around five minutes after opening it and nothing still has happened, then you'll probably have to reinstall the League client.

**This does not mean you have to redownload the entirety of League again.** You just have to reinstall the patcher. If you want instructions on how to do this without redownloading all of League again, then just ask.

Best of luck.

Thankyou, it eventually worked. 


Also, i can't download league anymore.. The link is broken..

Glad that it works.

About being unable to download League, a lot of Mac users are currently experiencing that. Hopefully it should be fixed in the next two days.
